definition: {"attrs":{"id":"mainLayer","width":1183.5,"height":841},"id":378,"className":"Layer","children":[{"attrs":{"draggable":true,"x":41,"y":52,"width":500,"height":408,"phemaObject":{"containedElements":[{"id":417},{"id":412}],"className":"LogicalOperator"},"element":{"id":"And","name":"And","description":"The AND operator is used to conjoin two or more QDM elements or phrases that must all be true for the logic to hold. In the QDM, truth is determined by the existence of matching events (or the expected non-existence of such events). Note: The addition of any measure phrase should always be preceded by an AND or an OR.","uri":"http://rdf.healthit.gov/qdm/element#And","type":"LogicalOperator"}},"id":407,"className":"PhemaGroup","children":[{"attrs":{"width":500,"height":408,"fill":"#eeeeee","name":"mainRect","stroke":"gray","strokeWidth":3,"dash":[10,5]},"id":408,"className":"Rect"},{"attrs":{"width":500,"fontFamily":"Calibri","fontSize":16,"fill":"black","fontStyle":"bold","text":"And","name":"header","align":"center","padding":5,"height":"auto"},"id":409,"className":"Text"},{"attrs":{"y":204,"radius":7.5,"fill":"white","name":"leftConnector","stroke":"black","strokeWidth":1,"connections":[]},"id":410,"className":"PhemaConnector"},{"attrs":{"x":500,"y":204,"radius":7.5,"fill":"white","name":"rightConnector","stroke":"black","strokeWidth":1,"connections":[]},"id":411,"className":"PhemaConnector"},{"attrs":{"draggable":true,"x":20,"y":46,"phemaObject":{"className":"DataElement"},"width":175,"height":128,"element":{"id":"CDP","name":"Condition/Diagnosis/Problem","description":"Condition/Diagnosis/Problem represents a scientific interpretation of result, assessment, or treatment response data that indicates a condition that persists over time and tends to require intervention or management. It can also represent a clinical feature (e.g., those treated, monitored, evaluated) or that which impacts other treatments or venues of care (e.g., encounters or lengths of stay). It is used to guide planning, implementation, treatment, and evaluation. A problem or condition includes, but is not limited to: acute, intermittent, or chronic conditions; diagnoses; symptoms; functional limitations; and visit- or stay-specific conditions.","uri":"http://rdf.healthit.gov/qdm/element#CDP","type":"Category","children":[{"id":"DiagnosisActive","name":"Diagnosis, Active","description":"To meet criteria using this datatype, the diagnosis indicated by the Condition/Diagnosis/Problem QDM category and its corresponding value set should reflect documentation of an active diagnosis. Keep in mind that when this datatype is used with timing relationships, the criterion is looking for an active diagnosis for the time frame indicated by the timing relationships.","uri":"http://rdf.healthit.gov/qdm/element#DiagnosisActive","type":"DataElement"},{"id":"DiagnosisFamilyHistory","name":"Diagnosis, Family History","description":"To meet criteria using this datatype, the diagnosis indicated by the Condition/Diagnosis/Problem QDM category and its corresponding value set should reflect a diagnosis of a family member.","uri":"http://rdf.healthit.gov/qdm/element#DiagnosisFamilyHistory","type":"DataElement"},{"id":"DiagnosisInactive","name":"Diagnosis, Inactive","description":"To meet criteria using this datatype, the diagnosis indicated by the Condition/Diagnosis/Problem QDM category and its corresponding value set should reflect documentation of an inactive diagnosis. Keep in mind that when this datatype is used with timing relationships, the criterion is looking for an inactive diagnosis for the time frame indicated by the timing relationships.","uri":"http://rdf.healthit.gov/qdm/element#DiagnosisInactive","type":"DataElement"},{"id":"DiagnosisResolved","name":"Diagnosis, Resolved","description":"To meet criteria using this datatype, the diagnosis indicated by the QDM category Condition/Diagnosis/Problem and its corresponding value set should reflect documentation of a resolved diagnosis. Keep in mind that when this datatype is used with timing relationships, the criterion is looking for a resolved diagnosis for the time frame indicated by the timing relationships.","uri":"http://rdf.healthit.gov/qdm/element#DiagnosisResolved","type":"DataElement"}]}},"id":417,"className":"PhemaGroup","children":[{"attrs":{"width":175,"height":128,"fill":"#dbeef4","name":"mainRect","stroke":"black","strokeWidth":1},"id":418,"className":"Rect"},{"attrs":{"width":175,"fontFamily":"Calibri","fontSize":14,"fill":"black","text":"Condition/Diagnosis/Problem","name":"header","align":"center","padding":5,"height":"auto"},"id":419,"className":"Text"},{"attrs":{"x":10,"y":43,"width":155,"height":75,"fill":"#EEEEEE","name":"termDrop","stroke":"#CCCCCC","strokeWidth":1},"id":420,"className":"Rect"},{"attrs":{"x":10,"y":43,"width":155,"height":75,"fontFamily":"Calibri","fontSize":14,"fill":"gray","text":"Drag and drop value sets here, or click to search","align":"center","padding":5,"name":"termDropText"},"id":421,"className":"Text"},{"attrs":{"y":64,"radius":7.5,"fill":"white","name":"leftConnector","stroke":"black","strokeWidth":1,"connections":[]},"id":422,"className":"PhemaConnector"},{"attrs":{"x":175,"y":64,"radius":7.5,"fill":"white","name":"rightConnector","stroke":"black","strokeWidth":1,"connections":[]},"id":423,"className":"PhemaConnector"}]},{"attrs":{"draggable":true,"x":20,"y":194,"width":460,"height":194,"phemaObject":{"containedElements":[{"id":396},{"id":389},{"id":403},{"id":404}],"className":"LogicalOperator"},"element":{"id":"Or","name":"Or","description":"The OR operator is used to conjoin two or more QDM elements or phrases for which at least one must be true for the logic to hold. In the QDM, truth is determined by the existence of matching events (or the expected non-existence of such events). Note: The addition of any measure phrase should always be preceded by an AND or an OR.","uri":"http://rdf.healthit.gov/qdm/element#Or","type":"LogicalOperator"}},"id":412,"className":"PhemaGroup","children":[{"attrs":{"width":460,"height":194,"fill":"#eeeeee","name":"mainRect","stroke":"gray","strokeWidth":1,"dash":[10,5]},"id":413,"className":"Rect"},{"attrs":{"width":460,"fontFamily":"Calibri","fontSize":16,"fill":"black","fontStyle":"bold","text":"Or","name":"header","align":"center","padding":5,"height":"auto"},"id":414,"className":"Text"},{"attrs":{"y":97,"radius":7.5,"fill":"white","name":"leftConnector","stroke":"black","strokeWidth":1,"connections":[]},"id":415,"className":"PhemaConnector"},{"attrs":{"x":460,"y":97,"radius":7.5,"fill":"white","name":"rightConnector","stroke":"black","strokeWidth":1,"connections":[]},"id":416,"className":"PhemaConnector"},{"attrs":{"draggable":true,"x":20,"y":46,"phemaObject":{"className":"DataElement"},"width":175,"height":128,"element":{"id":"CDP","name":"Condition/Diagnosis/Problem","description":"Condition/Diagnosis/Problem represents a scientific interpretation of result, assessment, or treatment response data that indicates a condition that persists over time and tends to require intervention or management.
